# Operations Submodule

This submodule provides access to operation tracking for SQL Instance Pools.

<!-- markdownlint-disable MD033 -->
## Requirements

The following requirements are needed by this module:

- <a name="requirement_terraform"></a> [terraform](#requirement\_terraform) (~> 1.5)

- <a name="requirement_azapi"></a> [azapi](#requirement\_azapi) (>= 2.4)

## Resources

The following resources are used by this module:

- [azapi_resource.operation](https://registry.terraform.io/providers/Azure/azapi/latest/docs/data-sources/resource) (data source)

<!-- markdownlint-disable MD013 -->
## Required Inputs

The following input variables are required:

### <a name="input_instance_pool_id"></a> [instance\_pool\_id](#input\_instance\_pool\_id)

Description: The resource ID of the parent SQL Instance Pool.

Type: `string`

## Optional Inputs

The following input variables are optional (have default values):

### <a name="input_operation_id"></a> [operation\_id](#input\_operation\_id)

Description: The GUID identifier of the operation to query. If not provided, no operation will be queried.

Type: `string`

Default: `null`

## Outputs

The following outputs are exported:

### <a name="output_operation"></a> [operation](#output\_operation)

Description: The operation resource details.

## Modules

No modules.
